ai_description: Forged in the fires of Sheol, the mysterious 15th level of the World Dungeon, these protective, expensive artifacts are built and sold by traveling Spider Reaper Minions. They also sell lollipops, which are said to be out of this world. When you absolutely, positively want to keep something safe, put it in this box. It will protect against most—but not all—forms of abuse. Warning: Every time you open this case, there is a 1.5% chance you will be blasted with the Sheol Fire spell. That’s not a good thing. The item within the case will remain protected.
name: Sheol Glass Reaper Case
